scripts.rustup: curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh; curl https://rustwasm.github.io/wasm-pack/installer/init.sh -sSf | sh; rustup default stable; rustup update stable; rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown
scripts.ownables:build: CC=/usr/local/opt/llvm/bin/clang AR=/usr/local/opt/llvm/bin/llvm-ar wasm-pack build --target web ./ownables/$npm_config_path/ && touch ./ownables/$npm_config_path/assets/$npm_config_path.zip && rm -f ./ownables/$npm_config_path/assets/$npm_config_path.zip && rm -f ./ownables/$npm_config_path/pkg/bindgen.js && mv ./ownables/$npm_config_path/pkg/*.js ./ownables/$npm_config_path/pkg/bindgen.js && zip -r -j ./ownables/$npm_config_path.zip ./ownables/$npm_config_path/assets/ ./ownables/$npm_config_path/pkg/*.js ./ownables/$npm_config_path/pkg/*.wasm
scripts.ownables:build-all: for DIR in $(ls ./ownables); do test -d ./ownables/$DIR && npm run ownables:build --path=$DIR; done
